data.message: I was blocked from uploading videos due to "infringement". I only uploaded one video of my cousin and I having a fun night singing and dancing with music in the background. How is that infringement? I highly doubt that any celebrity would mind their fans having fun and dancing to their music. The fact that there is no direct way to have this issue resolved is very disappointing and a bad look for FB customer service. I did nothing wrong.

replies.message: Hi LaTasha. We’re sorry you had a bad experience. If you have questions regarding copyright, please visit our copyright Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2pCOpwI. -Jessica
That doesn't even address the problem in this situation. No help at all.
I swear, robots must answer these questions!
Please help and open my account I can go life on my page or put my video on my page please help and open me back
Simon Sea You're commenting on my post not contacting FB
